entities.name: dobby
entities.description: The house-elf who is sponging Harry's forehead in the dark. He has goggling tennis-ball eyes and a long, pointed nose.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who missed the train and was stopped by Dobby from going through the barrier.

relationships.description: Dobby stopped Harry Potter from going through the barrier, as revealed in their conversation.
Dobby warned Harry Potter about something, but the details are not specified.
